website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundDock Portable is a really good iPod speaker, but it should cost less than $400.
pros: Relatively compact and portable iPod speaker with a detachable replaceable lithium-ion rechargeable battery that powers the speaker and iPod
includes auxiliary input and remote control
cons: only three hours of battery life at full volume

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, portability, and durability
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for a couple of years now and it has been great to me. It sounds loud and clear, and better than anything this size that I have come across. The speaker has traveled around the world with me and it has survived rainstorms and a banged up life inside my backpack. The only thing that broke down was the adaptor. It stopped working, but I was able to find a replacement online for cheap. The replacement was even better because it was smaller and was easier to travel with. I wish they continued to make this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: logotico

customer_reviews.title: Best 30-pin Ipod/iPhone Speaker Deck
customer_reviews.text: Bose is the best! Superior patented sound, especially in a church cathedral :) Well worth the investment. Already have one, bought this because it's the same model which has been discontinued. I would like everyone to know that BOSE TAKES CARE Of THEIR CUSTOMERS! I had to send my old one in to Bose for repair when the pin connection got loose (main problem with these) Not only did they replace the swing out deck, but sent me back a new remote and back up charger; I honestly think they refurbished the whole thing. Not only that, but they also sent me shipping labels and did not charge me a penny for any of this, for a practically new machine!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl mccourtie

customer_reviews.title: If you have an older iPod this is the best speaker to buy for external listening
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, I love this product! This is my second Bose SoundDock, the first one is nine years old and going strong. I wanted a second one for my studio and it has great sound quality for its size as you would expect from Bose. This was advertised as "Used-Good" and it arrived carefully packaged, is in good shape and works great.
customer_reviews.author: EAnne

customer_reviews.title: I've been using it over 5 years now and although the battery doesn't last like it used to
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used because I was too cheap to buy a brand new one. I've been using it over 5 years now and although the battery doesn't last like it used to, it still works and sounds great! Only issue is the iPod dock connection disconnects if it's bumped at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marc W Algozzino

customer_reviews.title: Sound Dock Charger
customer_reviews.text: My charger is not working if possible to replaced ? The charger the one in the picture What I want to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremias Puche

customer_reviews.title: SOUND DOCK NEVER WORKED CONNECTED TO MY IPOD TOUCH
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound BUT my sound dock never worked with my Ipod touch. I ordered the 30 pin converter, in any case, it never worked. I had to plug in my ipod with the cord that one would use to connect a CD player, and it could play like this, but the remote only works for volume connected like this, NOT to skip or pause songs, etc. That was disappointing because I wanted to be able to use my remote control and the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: My favorite one!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has been with me for years and works like the first day. Battery now does not last as long as years ago, but it is pretty decent. Love the sound and design. When it dies I am gonna miss it.
customer_reviews.author: JuanferVe

customer_reviews.title: Bose Sounddock
customer_reviews.text: This sounddock is awesome. Bose is the ultimate in audio and this speaker is great for old school classic iPods or you can get a 30 pin bluetooth receiver and play your music apps through it for great sound!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance when I bought this used, I don't like to buy something used with out first testing it out, but my mind was set to ease when I opened the box and pulled out the speaker set. It looked brand new and sounds awesome, just like my plug in Bose Sound Dock. I work for Ready2Roll Pedicabs in Houston and I use this every event I work. The rechargeable battery has lasted every event so far, we sometimes work 8 or more hours. You will not get disappointed if you buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Houston Pedicab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home and outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SoundDock after reading many reviews online...and we were not disappointed. I gave it to my husband for Christmas and he was very pleased. The sound quality is amazing, as is the convenience of being able to use it just about anywhere. I went back and forth about whether or not to spend the extra money on the portable; however, I am glad I did beause the outdoor speakers for our old stereo system were shot. Rather than invest in new speakers and rewiring, I thought we would give this a try, especially because 99% of the music we listen to is on the ITouch, anyway. Great decision...great product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Macchio

customer_reviews.title: Bose IPOD Sound System - no need for wireless speakers outside
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products out there for home or on the go music. I wanted a wireless patio music system, but didn't want the hassles or cost of setting it up. Instead, my sister told me about the Bose IPOD sound system- bought it- love it! Sound is great, even outdoors - loud enough for a large patio with great sound! Easy to use, easy to tote around and battery life for this model lasts as claimed- about 2.5 hours before needing a charge. I can hardly wait to also take in on vacation! Love the remote for sound control or song changes!
customer_reviews.author: MargR

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Did not work when i received it. Sent it back and was out 35 dollars for shipping. Seller said he was within his rights to charge me shipping even though the product did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Young

customer_reviews.title: Bose sounddock Portable 30
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound when connected to iPhone, didn't come with remote for volume control so I connected to Echo dot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this Bose Portable Speaker system. However, the best part of this purchase was the seller. I couldn't get the unit to work, called Bose who referred me back to the seller. He in turn contacted Bose to get results and had them send me a new remote. That didn't work either until I realized I had to remove the plastic case I had put onto my iPhone. It worked perfectly. The communication and efforts by this seller went way beyond my expectations. Thank you for your cooperation and diligence in getting my Bose to work!
customer_reviews.author: MiMiVanV

customer_reviews.title: Adaquate
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. It is fine for listening to long playlists or long podcasts but switching between albums or playlists is difficult with the limited abilities of the remote. The only way to control it is with the remote so if you forget it or leave it in another room you have make changes to content using the ipod itself. You need the remote to adjust volume significantly. I use it with an ipod classic and the connection is not great. It disconnects with the slightest bump. For me it has good sound but not a great product, especially for the price. As I said, it is adaquate.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O.

customer_reviews.title: Add a Bluetooth adapter to stream your music wirelessly
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have superb high quality sound. Great solid base. Portable. 8 hours on battery. If you want to stream music wirelessly from your iPhone or iPad purchase the Miccus BluBridge Mini-Jack RX: Bluetooth Music Receiver use with Bluetooth-Enabled Mobile Phones, Tablets, PCs and Apple (BBMR-02). Plug the mini bridge into the 3.5 headphone jack, pair with your iPhone or iPad and you have an all-in-one music system on the go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The SoundDock is awesome! It makes it so nice to remotely listen to my IPod music without the hassle of earbuds. The sound is full and rich, as a Bose product should be. I would recommend this item to anyone who wants to avoid listening to talking heads or commercials on the radio. So much nicer when you can change your mood simply by changing the music. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Soboleski

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit - not as advertised though
customer_reviews.text: I returned this as I bought it for portability and description said it had an Li-ion battery included. As they don't make these anymore and the item was lightly used, seller didn't realize the battery pack was missing. Sound was great, but had to be plugged in. Verify what you are getting if you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: sumstuphph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Design and Sound
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Portable Soundock for iPods does not disappoint. The sound quality is superb and the design is flawless. The base sound is deep and full; the treble is clear. The remote is fairly intuitive. The battery life is also pretty impressive. The portability (light weight and ease to carry) is most compelling. It works perfectly with my large iPod purchased four years ago and with my brand new Apple iPhone 4. This is a must-have item but like all Bose products, it does not come cheaply. They charge a premium on all of their products and get away with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Packaging sucked!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bose Portable Speaker Dock. I've only used it once and I haven't ported it anywhere just yet (another review later). My big COMPLAINT is the seller's packaging. My friend came by and the package was at the front door. He picked it up and shook it. He than said, "I hope this isn't anything expensive"... The box from the manufacturer had two pieces of rolled up brown paper surrounding the Bose box. The packaging sucked. I couldn't imagine my new dock being tossed around in transit. What were they thinking? I will NEVER buy from that seller again! Thankfully Bose packs their equipment quite well...
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and convenient battery
customer_reviews.text: This is a big sounding unit for the size. Just 5x better than any mini system I've heard. Deep bass, crisp highs, the remote is a nice touch. We have the older model with the iPhone 4 dock and just use the Aux cable input.
customer_reviews.author: sookie23

customer_reviews.title: very recommended to buy a bluetooth music receiver if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: not liking the sound quality at high levels. being portable that is not a big drawback as it does what it's suppose to do. very recommended to buy a bluetooth music receiver if you have an iPhone 5 or newer, although it won't charge your phone it is very convenient to pick songs from a distance when you are in a pool or a picnic. recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Morales Nemez

customer_reviews.title: happy birthday portable music
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday/christmas gift for teenage son. He was so excited and loves that the bass is so clear. He took it outside and cranked to the max and was clear and great. Nice sound even though as a MOM wondering why I bought this to listen to the bass beat on some of his songs. At least I know where he is!!! Checked out alot of the reviews and decided the cost was worth the long term benefit since my son is usually careful with his stuff and this will be great for a long time. Shipment arrive quickly.
customer_reviews.author: lastonetobuy

customer_reviews.title: Love the portable one the best
customer_reviews.text: I've always been an Altec Lancing fan for 50 years. After having problems with the 810 dock two times and reading the reviews of others not receiving service from Altec I decided to try Bose. I'll never go back to Altec!!! The sounds are great in the high, medium and low ranges. The battery does last 8 hours and the remote always works. The Altec did not work correctly. Great job Bose!!!
customer_reviews.author: SonnyPines

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could find a better dock for less. Well I was wrong . After about a years worth of research and buying cheaper products I finally bit the bullet and spent the $399. I could not be more pleased. How does Bose do it? Such wonderful sound from such a small device. I highly recommend this product. Spend the extra $100 and get the battery powered dock. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Zalesnik

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. Words cannot explain how happy I am with this order. It is in great shape and it does exactly what we need it for. I use it for my dance team. the speaker puts out clear music and is loud enough to use in a gym. Beautiful piece of equipment. It has an auxillary plug for the back and we can hook up other things like computers and other mp3 players.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A desk top wonder!
customer_reviews.text: No better sound from a desk top sized iPhone dock. Deep bass, even at low volumes. A real rich sound. Bose has everyone beat in this regard--great sound in a small package. I know their larger speakers for surround sound are controversial among audiophiles, but nothing beats this dock for size and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Margulies

customer_reviews.title: great music
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for a party but am so glad that I have it for future use. It is so easy to use. The sound for me is great and it can be played quite loudly. I now have it sitting in the living room and it blends in with the furniture. It is very portable. It is pricey and I don't know if others would have been as good for less money but I am quite pleased with my purchase and would buy a Bose product again based on this experience
customer_reviews.author: Goo baby

customer_reviews.title: I love this Sounddock
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. We love the sound of this soundock. We carry it to the beach, on vacation, to friends partys. I can play my ipod or i use a cable and use my iPad with a program called djay to actually dj music at parties with this little box with big sound. I have tried other products from competitors but none sound as good as the sounddock.
customer_reviews.author: Chief G

customer_reviews.title: Thing thing bumps!
customer_reviews.text: This thing bumps! I know Bose is known for their high quality audio products and I must admit, I was a tad bit skeptical at just how much this thing could pump out. Not anymore. Highs, Mids, and Lows sound really really nice for a portable speaker and doesn't distort at high volume. I was impressed. I'm not an audiophile but I must say, worth every penny in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ZakAttack

customer_reviews.title: I left it outside on the pouring Chicago rain for a whole night and it worked just fine the next day
customer_reviews.text: I bought thia two years ago and its solid quality and works as new. I left it outside on the pouring Chicago rain for a whole night and it worked just fine the next day, portable battery works great too and lasts a whole night. Great purchase! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Bose Sounddock
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. If you want to your neighborhood to hear you playing music but want a small and portable solution this is the one for you. Two draw back no easy place to store the remote, so easily lost (I attached mine with velcro), and the dock for the ipod is not flush to the table top so when my kids push down on it it causes a little stress, nothing has broken but a concern of mine, but if you don't let kids play with it you have nothing to worry about. THIS IS THE BEST PORTABLE DOCK OUT THERE>
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Headley

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BOSE Speaker system!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to L-O-V-E about this BOSE Speaker system. It sounds just as good as ANY Stereo (except for maybe a BOSE Stereo system). Big sound, crystal clear and portable. Especially with the carry all bag! IT IS WORTH THE $!
customer_reviews.author: Little Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good sounds but my Ipod can't charge due to dock being non operational.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Avery

customer_reviews.title: unhappy
customer_reviews.text: This rebuilt was a dud, it would not connect to my I phone. It would only stay on for a few seconds then turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen C Auger

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I've used mine for over a year now and it has worked flawlessly all the time. I've used an iPhone 3GS in it, as well as the iPhone 4. The sound is fantastic and I love the portability of the system. My ONLY complaint is the price, which I feel is way too high (like most Bose products). I'd probably give the system 5 stars for performance, and 1 star for price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SPEAKER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker I have ever heard. It actually sounds as good as the surround system in my home. I would highly recommend it for any purpose. It sounds great indoors and out. It is very easy to use and works perfectly with my iPhone, iPod, and even other mp3 players like my Sansa. It is PERFECRT!!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: TAZBUG

customer_reviews.title: First class sound quality
customer_reviews.text: First class sound quality. excellent product. Only criticism is there is no where to set the remote ( would be nice to have a little clip at the back), and while battery allows for portability, lack of a handle or any easy way to carry it makes it a little awkward to lug around. But overall the sound is what you are looking for and this has it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bons

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The system itself is up to the standards of the Bose name. The quality of the sound is outstanding. I purchased this unit though for it's portability and remote. The remote does not work. I am sorry that I didn't read the reviews before purchasing. It seems that many people are having remote issues. Some have tried to fix it themselves. I however am choosing to return it disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BAB

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: No wonder why this seller has always have great review. I receive my Used Bose Sound dock LIKE BRAND NEW...THANK YOU DAVID..I RECOMMEND YOU AND YOUR BUSINESS TO MY FRIENDS..
customer_reviews.author: edwin f.

customer_reviews.title: Momma,s  Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have the Bose V25 sound system which replaced my Bose 10 system with a Yamaha receiver I had for 25 years and still works great, so my wife wanted a ipod system so why not keep the Bose rolling, sounds as good as the V25 , wife love,s it. I rate it a 5 and would recommend it to anybody,just give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Shop-N Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: The bose portable speaker is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am more than esctatic about the unit. It has exceeded my expectations. The item was as promised. Although it took more than usual to deliver it was well worth the wait. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Dye

customer_reviews.title: Veery bad product sold better on e Bay at least u ...
customer_reviews.text: Veery bad product sold better on e Bay at least u get to c the photos of the product
customer_reviews.author: Collin Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Just Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I do a deep study en this kind of speakers, i listen de LG, SONY, BEATS and The Bose, And let me tell you that bose win the fight! Excellent purchase i love my speakers. I bought the bluetooth receiver and thats all you need to connect any deviced that you want!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Linares Capponi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too bad these aren't still in production. One of the best Speakers around. Great sound and portability.
customer_reviews.author: a fan

customer_reviews.title: BOSE SoundDock
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The BOSE SoundDock is a fantastic machine the performs well and sounds even better. The fact the it is portable and has a battery life of 6 plus hours of use are just a couple of my favorite features. The BOSE SoundDock is a must have for anyone with an iPod, iPhone, the ability to move through your playlist seamlessly is just another added feature that makes this the best buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Keltner

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am using this SoundDock for so many things. I love that it is portable and I can take it with me by the pool, in the bathroom and in the kitchen. My favorite thing is to hook it up to my TV and rent a Blueray movie, I have my own home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen A. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Bose Portable IPOD Speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers that make my 160 GB IPOD sound really, really good. I feel like it is over-priced. There are many alternative speakers for much less money available, but I love the Bose quality sound, and I could not decide on a speaker system for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great portable speaker from bose, the sound is incredible. Bought it over the new bose sound link because it sounded tiny next to this one. Get it now while they still exist and get a bluetooth adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Pondo

customer_reviews.title: Portable, great sound
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I have more than one of these should be explanatory about how I feel about this product. Minimalist design, great deep sound for its size. And I can carry from room to room, or take it with me on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Spikey

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand some of the objections I read about this soundock. I have been researching doundocks for months, although I knew that no one could beat the Bose sound. At $399.00 it was a lot more than I wanted to spend, but after hearing my music and being able to carry it with me everywhere I didn't regret getting it. I only wish that it would do more than just play music from my iPod: I wish it would have more than one use, like also having radio capability. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Prepared for transport extremely well!
customer_reviews.text: Once I opened the box, I was very happy to see enough bubble wrap surrounding it for two of these things!! The unit and the accessories look in mint condition, and my very old iPod fits great and sounds awesome on it. Great seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Have had and used for several years
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Have had and used for several years. Fantastic sound. Great battery life. Haven't been very impressed with the sound of others Bose equipment but am very impressed with this. Very loud for the size. People complement the sound all the time.
customer_reviews.author: bookbuy

customer_reviews.title: e to by extra hardware to be compatible with your device
customer_reviews.text: This product was missing parts and was not compatible with I phone
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ostwald

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundDock Portable
customer_reviews.text: The Bose SoundDock Portable has amazing bass for such a small unit. I have owned other iPod docking stations, some considered "high end" but none compare to the bass of the Bose. Also produces great highlights in the treble end and is a pleasure to listen to. I was disappointed in the life of the battery between charges. Bose states that the battery will last about 3 hours on full volume. That's just about true on most volume settings. The battery remains charged for a considerable time when not in use, so I got two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: jfhnhh

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Best electronic ever bought. Sound quality superb, lightweight and easily taken where ever you want...... Can't beat Bose for quality
customer_reviews.author: Rachel North

customer_reviews.title: Used at all house parties
customer_reviews.text: We used my friend's sound dock at all our parties in college so had to get our own. Great look, awesome sound (expected from Bose). Don't underestimate this sound dock, It can get REALLY loud and you can hear the awesome bass beats to all your jams. BTW this is not a radio, just an ipod/iphone sound dock... Has an awesome little remote to control everything. Controls are also on the side of the dock, very sensitive touch. Love that it is portable. Battery life is okay, wish it would last a bit longer though.
customer_reviews.author: beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Love Bose products
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass and charges my iPod. Great for playing music
customer_reviews.author: J. Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: While it's a bit overpriced and isn't loaded with features, the Bose SoundDock is classy looking and sounds excellent for a compact iPod/iPhone speaker. I am very happy with my purchase and love Bose quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Somerville

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundDock Portable 30-Pin iPod Speaker Dock
customer_reviews.text: I chose to give this product a 5 star rating because it is everything, that I thought it would be and more! The sound quality is great! I have had no problems with it at all! I would recomend it to anyone who appreciates good sounding music, it is portable so it would be easy to take to parties! It is really easy to charge and it charges your iPod while it is attached as well! I have always admired Bose products from a far and now I am proud to say that I own one of their products, and love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas 2012. She loved it and it sounded great. 8 months later it is dead to the world. Won't charge the phone, won't play music.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but if you listen to music with hard bass, skip this product and get the altec lansig 810 unit.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but if you listen to music with hard bass, skip this product because it cannot compare with the altec lansig 810 unit. I returned this the same day i received it. I guess not every bose product is created equally.
customer_reviews.author: DaveP

customer_reviews.title: sound is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is very good. I've never spent any large amount of money for a portable player. We wanted something to use everywhere IE back yard, front porch, dining room. It's just great. Very happy I purchased this and absouletly recomend this. I think we will have this for many years. The sound far exceeds anything else we heard in this price range. I waited for a month or so to be sure I was so happy. Like the remote, like the battery warning when batteries are getting low. Plays for many hours on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: That I'm Amazon prime number one Patriot.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the bose set, but what I didn't like it didn't comer to with the remote. I hope I'm Amazon page
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR GRIMES

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is just wonderful! It's small and compact but has great sound quality and volume. It comes with a remote that is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and I love how it's portable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these portable sound docks. You can take it with you on the deck! Good sound and base.
customer_reviews.author: Athenasculptress

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electronic
customer_reviews.text: This music system has met our expectations completely. We wanted to use it for an outdoor party and it sounded great. The sound was full and clear from across the lawn about 15 yards away. The portability is a great plus. No cords get in your way with the rechargeable battery. Perfect. Bose has never disappointed us. Super purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Charger doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I need support. The charger doesn't work. I need to know if you can change this charger or what can i do?
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Morales

customer_reviews.title: I have always liked BOSE
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this unit. The sound is great and the fact that it is portable is fantastic. Can you buy better? Sure, but for the money there really is nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: James A Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Im a bit hard of hearing and this little sounddock
customer_reviews.text: brings tears to my eyes I'm a bit embarrassed to say because I can hear the sounds so beautiful!!! I have an Ipod Classic I use. I bot it used and ordered the missing remote from Bose which was super cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky with audio sound. This Boze has awesome sound for it's small size. Have used heavily on the beach and at outside patio events. Will rock loud! The rechargable battery is a great option...makes it very mobile. If you push it loud with bold base, I seemed to get about 6 hours battery life before needing recharge, not bad. Remote is easy to use. If you love music, this Boze is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: WCA

customer_reviews.title: best there is
customer_reviews.text: so far no complaints... great sound quality and no incidents to report, did not give 5 stars on physical design because being a portable sound dock the design could be improved to make portability easier... not so light either still in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Beebee

customer_reviews.title: Just say  "it's a BOSE"
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, sound without comparison. Just to say that is for apple users. You have the option of an external (AUX) connection but is not the same. Android users, it is not the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Puentes

customer_reviews.title: My baby :-)
customer_reviews.text: What is not to love about a Bose product. I have been waiting for this speaker to decrease in price and make it more affordable for me to buy. Finally, I bought it and I do not have any regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Rovi Trom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The sound is unbeatable. It's easy to move this room to room. It fits easily on a nightstand. The only drawbacks are its not having a clock and that the iPod alarm doesn't go off when it's docked, but neither is that important to me.
customer_reviews.author: goddessoftheclassroom

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with the purchase of this speaker dock. It arrived in record time, was well-packaged, and was in perfect condition. As expected, the speaker dock has wonderful sound, is light-weight and is the perfect size for carrying from place-to-place. The sound is even really good out by the pool or by the grill. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal on this Bose SoundDock
customer_reviews.text: Great Bose sound...portable...very happy with purchase! Was reluctant about it being refurbished but no problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: John Halajko

customer_reviews.title: Bose
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Simply dock and play. I was up and running in seconds for a party with access to 1000s of songs. Great quality and sound. I love music so sound was very important to me. How such a small portable system can produce such high quality sound is baffling. Love the battery pack power as I can walk anywhere, sit, play and relax. These are amazing times and music is being played with a new and fresh sound. If you are a music afficionado, and you are looking for immediate, portable, high quality sound, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nf

customer_reviews.title: and good quality. I am happy with my
customer_reviews.text: On time I receive the item in Colombia, without damage, and good quality. I am happy with my buy
customer_reviews.author: DORA ARRIETA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality, Love it
customer_reviews.text: it is expensive system compared to other manufactures. Bose makes great products. Made another purchase of Bose® Lifestyle® V35 home entertainment system--Black before this one. Both works great
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy MiddleWest

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundDock
customer_reviews.text: As with any Bose this is a great unit. Unbelievable sound, easy to use. Battery last quite long, Left it unpluged for a day and a half and still did not need charging.....Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is what I expect from Bose and the unit is easy to carry around which allows me to set it up not only for personal enjoyment, but to use in a class setting.
customer_reviews.author: OldGrayDog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. Sound is clear
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Sound is clear. Would love a little more bass but overall the sound quality is even. Shipping took almost two weeks but was well worth the wait. Arrived in good condition. When placing an iphone in the 30 pin slot need to get it just right in order for a connection to be made. Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sisti

customer_reviews.title: ... exactly as I was expecting BUT the seller was amazing! I'm a very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: These didn't look exactly as I was expecting BUT the seller was amazing! I'm a very satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It was totally worth the money! The sound is clear, it's totally portable, and fairly lightweight. I have not had the battery run out yet!
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible, the comfortable that brings the fact you don't need to be connected to AC is speechless. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: sounds good, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: OMG, must have....sounds good, easy to use, long battery live, just overall GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl671

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Loud!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gift for my husband our sixth year anniversary. He played it in the living room and I heard it outside. It is very loud and small to carry anywhere. I was very surprised to hear the sound system on that little box. I plan to get another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: calientelo

customer_reviews.title: Truly meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a quality speaker to use with I-Pod and the Bose portable speaker meets all of my expection. I use Pandora Radio from the internet and this works perfect. Since the Bose is portable I can move it anyplace I want in my home. If I wish I can take it with me in my auto and listen to the music I have downloaded to my I-Pod. Actually since the speaker is portable you can use it anywhere. The quality of sound is the best. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hudacek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not the sound quality I expected for a BOSE product
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a ised ne it was very good still
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, i have dropped it a few times and it is still running good. It has amazing sound. It is also the loudest portable speaker I have found from looking around.
customer_reviews.author: RickStar

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Jon boat, and it's loud enough to be heard over my 25hp 2-stroke outboard motor, running just on the battery. If I need to, I can plug it into my battery, but I haven't had to yet. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michaeli

customer_reviews.title: Bose Sounddock Portable
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for two days and it has been plugged in during that time, but I am pleased with it so far. The sound isnt like my other Bose radio and I wonder why, but I am a staunch Bose fan, so I trust the brand. So all in all, my opinion is that for the money these cost, they should be better sounding, like the old Bose I know and love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very practical, you can take it anywhere you want ...
customer_reviews.text: Very practical,you can take it anywhere you want to.The sound of Bose is unbelievable.If you have the money go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our great room, which is about 500 sq. ft. The sound quality is amazing and the remote works from anywhere in the room. This was well worth the money!! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: SidesSchultz

customer_reviews.title: Best sound ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES the Bose SoundDock! The sound is terrific and the fact that it is portable makes it extra special. Used it for my sister's birthday party and down at the boatdock!
customer_reviews.author: ghbtexas

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy :)
customer_reviews.text: I read alot about this SoundDock before buying it, but still it impressed me when i hucked it up the first time sound is awsom, and very impressive for a thing at this size, the battery time last at least 8 hours playing it on a good level on the beach. If you gone travel or bring it around buy the bag that goes with it also, it`s to nice to handel with no care ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nr1rolf

customer_reviews.title: Top stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love it, though the battery life is not that long, I still like the product. One thing I think Bose should consider though is adding an EQ' to their products as music comes in different frequencies and sometimes you need to adjust the base, volume or treble.
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: G R E A T ! ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: one of the best toys i've ever bought, good size, light, so very loud (clear sound), i put it in my backpack and take it to the beach every other weekend, battery lasts about 5 to 6 hour, just enough...
customer_reviews.author: jose aular

product_meta.title: Bose SoundDock Portable 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Speaker Dock
feature_bullets: More efficient and higher quality audio reproduction than other battery-powered iPod speakers.
Works with many iPhone and iPod models. Requires an Apple Lightning to 30-pin adapter for use with iPhone 5 and other iPod and iPhone models with an Apple Lightning connector.
Rechargeable Li-ion battery gives more playing time per charge than other types of rechargeables
Built-in carry handle and rotating dock enable quick and easy transport from place to place
Auxiliary input for playing other audio sources, like a portable DVD, CD or other MP3 player.
